meanings.definition: Showing friendship or goodwill towards others.
meanings.sent1: The team had a comradely atmosphere during the game.
meanings.sent2: She greeted her classmates in a comradely manner.
meanings.sent3: The comradely group of friends always shared their snacks.
meanings.sent4: The comradely bond between the siblings was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The comradely smile on his face made everyone feel welcome.

meanings.definition: In a friendly or sociable manner.
meanings.sent1: They worked comradely to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The team members always interacted comradely with each other.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged its tail comradely at the new visitor.
meanings.sent4: The leaves rustled comradely in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The children played comradely in the park until sunset.
